GeneDef.label: psionic debuffer
GeneDef.description: Psionic Debuffers create constant auras around them that make their enemies easier to kill. Basic Debuffer's can only use their aura to impact their enemies externally, but higher tiered ones can burrow deeper into the body, and even take something from them. The auras are only active while the Debuffer is drafted to avoid accidents, and has a default range of 15. This only effects pawns that are in an enemy faction, so escaping prisoners may not be.\n\nAny number of Superhero Psionic paths can be taken at the same time. The only limiting factor is metabolic efficiency.

GeneDef.label: tunnel vision aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that decrease accuracy and melee dodge chance.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: molasses aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that decrease move speed and melee dodge chance.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: psychic alteration aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that alters psychic sensitive. By default this increases psychic sensitive, but the aura can be switched to decrease it. Usually it isn't worth it to switch the psychically dull aura unless you have a mod enabled that results in enemies gaining psychic buffs.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: aura burst
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can expand their aura temporarily by releasing large amounts of energy at once. This extends the normal range of 15 to 22.

GeneDef.label: psionic debilitator
GeneDef.description: Psionic Debilitators often have auras that go into the bodies of their enemies directly, making their enemies much easier to kill by making it easier to wound them, and much harder for them to recover from those wounds.

GeneDef.label: glass aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that reduces innate armor and healing rate.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: wound eroding aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that constantly worsens the wounds of their enemies.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: energy burning aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that constantly drains nutrition and strength of their enemies.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: channel aura
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene gain access to a stronger variation of aura burst that stuns the debuffer and gives them a psychic shield. This extends the normal range of 15 to 30 unless aura burst is active.

GeneDef.label: psionic ruiner
GeneDef.description: Psionic Ruiners tend to have few enemies that survive the first battle due to their ability to leave large numbers of enemies vulnerable with ease. They can reinforce their bodies using the lifeforce of those nearby, and even expand their aura to become large enough to cover entire platoons of enemies.

GeneDef.label: nauseous aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that makes nearby enemies have to stop to vomit frequently.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: siphon aura
GeneDef.description: This gene creates a constant aura that makes nearby non-player pawns take more damage, heal slower, and gain immunity slower, while also granting the carrier regeneration, immunity gain, and damage reduction based on the number of nearby non-player pawns. Unlike most auras, this is constantly active and is not affected by aura increases.\n\nPsionic genes reduce the special bonus granted by the related psionic path.

GeneDef.label: ruin the world
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene gain access to a stronger variation of channel aura that extends the range even more. This extends the normal range of 15 to 60 unless aura burst is active.
